[Dining Dilemnas](https://cbhs.wfu.edu/dining-dilemmas/) as is an ongoing, interdisplinary series allowing for informed discussion on complex topics starting in 2012.

The program is directed by [Dr. Pat Lord](https://biology.wfu.edu/faculty-research/pat-lord/) is popular with students pursuing a wide range of majors, and especially those considering careers in healthcare.
